title: silver-bullet
description: A STIX Silver Bullet solves all the world's problems.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `x-oasis-cti-tc-silver-bullet`.

aliases.description: Alternative names used to identify this Silver Bullet.

first_proposed.description: The time that this Silver Bullet was first proposed.

world_problem_solved.description: The time that this Silver Bullet was implemented globally and the major world problem solved.
